actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish the birthplace of Susan B. Anthony in Adams, Mass., as a national historic site.

summary.text: Establishes the birthplace of Susan B. Anthony in Adams, Massachusetts, as a national historic site. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to administer such site through the National Park Service. Authorizes the appropriation of funds for such purposes.

titles.title: A bill to establish the birthplace of Susan B. Anthony in Adams, Mass., as a national historic site.
